price: 他们询问左勒盖尔奈英的故事，你说：“我将对你们叙述有关他的一个报告。”
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَن ذِي ٱلۡقَرۡنَيۡنِۖ قُلۡ سَأَتۡلُواْ عَلَيۡكُم مِّنۡهُ ذِكۡرًا

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿan dhī al-qarnayni qul sa-atlū ʿalaykum min'hu dhik'ran
